modName: RS Children XPMSE Real Head Size
summary: A minor edits to the rescaled xpmse skeleton, made by Russian modder, the head is little smaller
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#ffff00]I OWN NONE OF THESE ASSET[/color]

[/size]First of all, let me introduce myself, my name Yuri, and I a Russian modder, first thing you may notice is that I speak like Borat, but let get on to the real thing.

[size=4][color=#ff0000]Why make this mod?[/color]

[/size]I made this mod to make kids look realistic, I no like to see beanhead kids running around my game, and first xpmse skeleton head seem too big for me, so I rescale the head a little to make things look real. 



[size=4][color=#ff0000]Is this skeleton compatible other child races?[/color]

[/size]Yes! it is, I test it with Skykids and RCOTS, Others, not so sure, and I also not sure if it work properly for beast race

[size=4]Note: these still contain TBBP and Vagina bones, I unable to do anything about that, so please do no use it for child pornography.

[/size][color=#ff0000][size=5]F.A.Q[/size][/color]
[color=#ffff00]
 1. Help! my kids have diferent head sizes!
[/color]That normal, it depend on the mesh of the child head.
[color=#ffff00] 
2. Is this for Player or NPC?[/color]
NPC, since Player can use Racemenu to rescale head. (duh)

[color=#ffff00]3. Why some kids not change at all?[/color]
That I not know, maybe you just saw things or I need to fix things

[color=#ffff00]4. Why your kids look diferent?[/color]
I uses different mod for them [color=#ff0000](NO NUDITY!!!)[/color] such as texture and hairstyle.

[color=#ffff00]5. Will you upload your child appearances?[/color]
No, they uses more than 50 mod, and I still have ask each mod author

[color=#ffff00]6. What ENB you use?[/color]
I call it Crap ENB, is my own, but I not sure if I upload since it have some imported asset.
author: Yuri The Crazy Russian
